verses.verse: A GOOD <S%H8034>name<s%> is rather to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> than <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H2896>loving<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> rather than <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> and <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H6298>meet<s%> together: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H6213>maker<s%> of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H7200>foresees<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H5641>hides<s%> himself: but the <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> on, and are <S%H6064>punished.<s%>
By <S%H6038>humility<s%> and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> and <S%H2416>life.<s%>
<S%H6791>Thorns<s%> and <S%H6341>snares<s%> are in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6141>fraudulent:<s%> he that does <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7368>far<s%> from them.
<S%H2596>Train<s%> up a <S%H5288>child<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> he should <S%H6310>go:<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H2204>old,<s%> he will not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from it.
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H4910>rules<s%> over the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> and the <S%H3867>borrower<s%> is <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H3867>lender.<s%>
He that <S%H2232>sows<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H205>vanity:<s%> and the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>anger<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail.<s%>
He that has a <S%H2896>bountiful<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed;<s%> for he <S%H5414>gives<s%> of his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor.<s%>
<S%H1644>Cast<s%> out the <S%H3887>scorner,<s%> and <S%H4066>contention<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out; yes, <S%H1779>strife<s%> and <S%H7036>reproach<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
He that <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H2890>pureness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> for the <S%H2580>grace<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and he <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H898>transgressor.<s%>
The <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man <S%H559>said,<s%> There is a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> I shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H2114>strange<s%> women is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>pit:<s%> he that is <S%H2194>abhorred<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H8033>therein.<s%>
<S%H200>Foolishness<s%> is <S%H7194>bound<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H5288>child;<s%> but the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H4148>correction<s%> shall drive it <S%H7368>far<s%> from him.
He that <S%H6231>oppresses<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> to <S%H7235>increase<s%> his riches, and he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> to the <S%H6223>rich,<s%> shall <S%H389>surely<s%> come to <S%H4270>want.<s%>

<S%H5186>Bow<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H7896>apply<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to my <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
For it is a <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> thing <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H8104>keep<s%> them <S%H990>within<s%> you; they shall <S%H3162>with<s%> be <S%H3559>fitted<s%> in your <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
That your <S%H4009>trust<s%> may be in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have made <S%H3045>known<s%> to you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> to you.
Have not I <S%H3789>written<s%> to you <S%H7991>excellent<s%> things in <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%>

That I might make you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7189>certainty<s%> of the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth;<s%> that you might <S%H7725>answer<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> to them that <S%H7971>send<s%> to you?
<S%H1497>Rob<s%> not the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he is <S%H1800>poor:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1792>oppress<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate:<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and <S%H6906>spoil<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of those that <S%H6906>spoiled<s%> them.
Make <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7462>friendship<s%> with an <S%H639>angry<s%> <S%H1167>man;<s%> and with a <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> you shall not <S%H935>go:<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H502>learn<s%> his <S%H734>ways,<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Be not you one of them that <S%H8628>strike<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> or of them that are <S%H6148>sureties<s%> for <S%H4859>debts.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you have <S%H369>nothing<s%> to <S%H7999>pay,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should he <S%H3947>take<s%> away your <S%H4904>bed<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> you?
<S%H5253>Remove<s%> not the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1366>landmark,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H6213>set.<s%>

<S%H2372>See<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4106>diligent<s%> in his <S%H4399>business?<s%> he shall <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%> he shall not <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2823>mean<s%> men.
